workflow.action: User defines spacing system in theme.spacing with tokens for sections, containers, gaps, padding, and margins using Tailwind classes or CSS values
workflow.validation: Spacing values validate as Tailwind utility classes (py-16 sm:py-20) or raw CSS (4rem, 16px, 1.5em)
workflow.expectedState: Spacing tokens stored with responsive variants (section: py-16 sm:py-20) and size variants (gap-small, gap, gap-large)

workflow.action: System generates CSS classes or inline styles for spacing tokens with responsive breakpoints
workflow.validation: Tailwind classes compile to responsive CSS, raw values apply as inline styles
workflow.expectedState: section class: padding-top: 4rem (base), padding-top: 5rem (sm+); container class: max-width + centering + horizontal padding

workflow.action: Layout components reference spacing tokens via theme.spacing.section for sections, theme.spacing.container for wrappers, theme.spacing.gap for flex/grid
workflow.validation: All layout components use themed spacing, no hardcoded margin/padding values
workflow.expectedState: Sections use vertical rhythm (py-16 sm:py-20), containers constrain width (max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4), flex/grid items have consistent gaps

workflow.action: User views application with consistent visual rhythm and spacing hierarchy
workflow.validation: Vertical rhythm creates breathing room between sections, containers maintain readable width, components have consistent internal/external spacing
workflow.expectedState: Professional layout system with balanced whitespace and responsive spacing
